Watercraft or vessel are water borne vehicles including ships, boats, hovercraft and submarines. Watercraft usually have propulsive capability (whether by sail, oar or engine) and hence are distinct from a simple device that merely floats, such as a log raft. namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan
